Review.Titre: It’s been a month and no one responded.
Review.Contenu: A4C has the worst customer service I have ever encountered. I have contacted them numerous times but still with no response. I purchased 2 items from them with the supposed 3 to 5 days delivery but they opt to choose DHL, which is a minimum 8 days delivery from their place in Texas to my location in Southern California. I contacted them on day 8 regarding delivery time, no response until 2 days later, after DHL hand the packages off to USPS, a delivery partner of DHL.It then took USPS 2 more days to mis mark the deliveries. I contacted A4C again and raised the concern of usps marked the packages as delivered but was not. A4C told me to wait for 2 more days as usps may mis mark the delivery but it usually arrives in the next 2 days.I waited, for 2 days, to contact A4C again. This time no response at all. I filed a claim with usps, sent another email to A4C telling them what I did, and asked them to also step in and check with shipping partner to push the concern. But of course no one answered. I waited for another 3 days, usps replied they have misdelivered to the wrong mailbox and advice me to contact the merchant. I attached the emails from usps to A4C, seeking resolutions, but still no response. I sent in another email asking for a resolution or I’ll have no choice but to dispute the charge. Told them I don’t want to take this route and don’t want to ruin their online reputation by having to write a negative review. Till today, it’s almost been a month, still no one responded. I honestly don’t know how I can recommend this business to anyone. Nor how can I hold myself back from leaving this review. It’s been a month and A4C still owe me hundreds of dollars, or products, or an answer. The worst part is they choose to hide and disappear, other than stepping up to take care of the problem. This is the worst online company I have ever dealt with, and I warn everyone to stay away from dealing business with them.

The downside to A4C’s service is they’ve “teamed up with TrustPilot” (by subscribing me) so they can spam me with unsolicited requests for a review - and requiring me to unsubscribe from something I never subscribed to.

Review.Titre: Slow to respond, but they will
Review.Contenu: Have asked for product support for two days without a response. Not sure why they don't list a phone number, but that makes me suspicious in and of itself. Product failed after two weeks and want to return but cannot get ahold of anyone in the company.UPDATE:  Company responded via email and made good on the item. Little slow in the response, but they did the right thing in the long run.

Slow delivery time. Took 5 days to prepare for shipping, and 8 days in transit. Didn't see anything during checkout indicating it would take so long. I ordered some plain masks. Hedged my bets that a mask order could get cancelled, so also ordered the same from a seller on eBay with free shipping. The eBay order was at my door 5 days after ordering.

I may have missed something in the ad but I did not realize the watch I ordered was refurbished or so complicated. There were NO instructions included for this Fossil watch, which came with a charging station.I can't figure out how to start it. I put it on the charger it went from red to blue, but the watch still not moving..I will probably return it. The watch itself is beautiful. Just not functional.

Review.Titre: i like the company and service
Review.Contenu: i like the company and service i ordered a roku stick with remote(new)after roughly 2 weeks the remote stopped workingnow i gotta pay out another 20 bucks for a new remote thru rokuif i knew this was going to happen.........i don't know if i would have bought it.....but i didn't know2 stars for the product, everything else 5 stars

I purchased a refurbished iPod Touch from A4C.com, or so I thought.While my credit card was charged immediately, the company never sent an order confirmation. Three days and three emails later, still no confirmation of my order.Beware of A4C.com.UPDATE: They finally responded, and my product finally arrived. I ended up returning it. Once they engaged, they were helpful. But, the overall experience was not good.

I placed my order on December 19 and a shipping label was created. I paid for expedited shipping because it was a Christmas present. On December 22 there was no update to the tracking information so I sent an email requesting more information. There was no response so I called them on Monday the 24th. According to their website they were supposed to be open. No answer. On December 27 I finally received an email saying my item was out of stock.

Received my "refurbished" Samsung Gear Fit 2 watch from A4C.  Shipping was prompt.  No paperwork or documentation or owner's manual for the device.  That was strange.  Used for 2 days then battery died.   I recharged the battery and it died again in less than 48 hours.  From what I read battery should last around 4-5 days with normal usage.  HELP!

Shipping on 2day express was marked, but said free shipping and handling on ad. Hit buy and paid for 2 day shipping... Tried to cancel right away... No option... Searched. Sent email... Said was already processed and i would have to send back... So 5 days later( not including weekend) i recieve my package...  One of the earbuds doesnt sit in charger correct... Have to carefully place in charger to charge...

Review.Titre: Defective S3 smart watch.  Poor customer service.
Review.Contenu: Purchased a refurbished S3 smart watch from the company with a 90 day warranty which I received in a timely manner.  32 days into owning it and the battery will not hold a charge past half a day.  Have tried to contact them by several methods several times with absolutely no response from them.  I would not recommend them for any purchase.

Review.Titre: I made an order by mistake
Review.Contenu: I made an order by mistake. I called them and they canceled the order. I then placed the correct order. I asked when my refund for cancelled order. I sent  4 emails never received an answer til I went thru PayPal to start a dispute. Still have not received my money back yet. Did however receive my correct order. I would not order from them again.

Review.Titre: Easy to Buy, Hard to Return
Review.Contenu: A4C delivers product well, but fails to respond to web mail, or voicemails.  I've contacted them several times for support, and to return an item under their 30 day "Any Reason" return policy. No response! Fortunately I've used PayPal for the purchase, I hope to get my money back going that route.'

The product, Samsung Gear Fit 2, arrived promptly in good condition.However there were NO printed instructions included. Nor were there any internet links for instructions.  And the device is not intuitively obvious, like where or how to even turn it 'on' or charge it.  A call to the warranty number elicited the response that they were unable to provide any instructions.  So I requested return authorization.

I purchased a refurbished iPad Air 32GB. Upon receiving the iPad I noticed the home button was broken. I asked for an even exchange. The website still lists the item for sale but the price has gone up$10 so they keep telling me that they can't exchange it because they're out of stock. But I can still order them off the website. That's fine. I will take my money elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Difficulty getting an exchange or a refund
Review.Contenu: We've had incredible difficulty getting an exchange for a malfunctioning tablet that we purchased from 4AC.  It is difficult to understand why A4C cannot access the device and wipe it clean prior to exchanging it.  As of this date, we have not received a) an exchange for the broken tablet, or b) a refund of our full payment.  Extremely unsatisfactory service.

It is hard to give them any more than two stars because the item never arrived. I waited for weeks, was told to wait another week, nothing arrived so they refunded my money. The refund experience was nice, but I will never buy from this company again because my first experience was a bad one. Not sure if they are trustworthy or not.

Still missing all the items for the one box that was my order. I'm unable to use my device until I have all the items that should have been included in my original order. Customer service was quick to say they shipped the missing item, but am yet to receive any tracking, never less the actual item. I would not recommend this site, and my first time was my last time.

Two chargers, described as new on web page but which arrived used, were described on the packing list as "Tested for Full functions, R2/Ready for Reuse."In fact neither worked as intended and apparently were either factory rejects or returned defective.  Deceptive sales techniques.  Company quickly accepted return request, issued RMA and provided prepaid return shipping label.  I am currently awaiting credit on credit card account.

Review.Titre: Shady way of shipping to Canada . Disappointed
Review.Contenu: I have bought many items from United States that did not exceed 100 United States dollars and have never being charged taxes and brokerage. When I picked up my $45 adapter for a tablet at the post office they wouldn't give it to me unless I pay them $15 and Brokerage +taxes. In the description it stated that the shipper mandated that I would pay taxes upon collection

I attempted to contact someone, anyone, at the customer service phone number yesterday, all day. Despite trying every option, multiple times, every single extension brought me to a disabled voicemail box and then hung up on me. I never did get a person. Additionally, the item I purchased came without any instructions.

The product I ordered was a refurbished item. I was not completely satisfied with how the product worked. I contacted A4C to return the item. It took two days to respond back to me via email and instead of fulfilling what I wanted, they offer a replacement "at no cost". All I wanted was what I asked: an RMA  number to return. Not another offer to replace.Now I'm waiting for another reply back which may take another two days.

Review.Titre: Purchased iWatch from what I thought …
Review.Contenu: Purchased iWatch from what I thought was a legitimate website, but ended up getting a demo watch that is used in retail stores.  After an hour of Googling why my watch wasn't syncing, I found out demo watches were typically stolen then sold online. I believe if this company truly tested the "refurbished" iWatch, then this issue would have been caught.  I rated 2 stars because the customer service end of returning the watch was quick and painless.

Shipped me absolute garbage. I bought a "refurbished" iPad and I thought I would receive at the very least a working item. I couldn't even set the thing up. Chips in the screen, the home button got stuck in the down position, and fingerprints all over the item when I took it out of the box. You'd think they would at least make sure the buttons worked before selling the item. They agreed to issue a refund, but what a waste of time. Look elsewhere.

I ordered a product from the site. The company sent the wrong product ... a completely wrong product (not even in the same category of product). When I asked to return the product and to have what I had ordered sent to me, they indicated that the product was no longer available. A very disappointing experience overall. Edit: It is now a full 19 days since I contacted the company about the error, and I only now have I received a credit for the incorrect order.

Saw the best price offered for the refurbished tracker on CNET. Keen to get it and ordered right away. Only problem is I am still waiting after the order was acknowledged on August 2.  It is now August 12. Will it ever get here. The online tracking on the Canadian side shows nothing. Time to go back to a reliable on line retailer, namely Amazon.

Not really what I was expecting from these wireless Bluetooth earbuds. They do not last as long as they say they do for talk time nor music playtime. I usually use them on and off throughout the course of my day and answer call often. I have noticed that after 2 hours, battery needs recharge. Audio quality for hearing music it’s very poor. I was expecting a better quality but unfortunately it didn’t meet my expectations. Not bad for the price so I’m glad I didn’t pay more than what I did.

I ordered Nexus 10 32 GB Tablet.But i got 16GB so when i got the tablet i checked everything what about the people who don't know about it? They have to use it till warranty expire? Or maybe never know till something wrong. So i tired to E-mail and contact Customer service. They replyed me and 2 answer and no more then i call them. That made me get the answer from then how to do for the wrong product. And i am waiting for the right one they will send it to me.

I think you sent me the wrong converter Jack. The directions said to go from a three-and-a-half millimeter to a two and a half millimeter which is what I ordered. But the one you sent me I could fit three of the Jacks in the audio out output instead of just one as it should be. you sent me a tiny one. I think I deserve the right product! Mike

Bought a refurbished Moto 360 smartwatch. Turns off by itself after about 1 min and can't be turned back on without being placed on the charger. It's highly doubtful they performed any QA (outside perhaps of just turning it on to see if it powered up for 10 secs) or they would have caught the fact that the watch was broken. At least I was issued an RMA rather quickly but still had to shell out $20 for shipping and waste time going to the post office. So yeah, not so good.

Very unhappy! Got the pad! I charged it 100%  want come on.  So I called customer service and to find out couldn't get another one until this one got there. Well I kept on and finally told me another one would go out as soon asyou see it went out in the mailed. It was mailed it before 11.  But first i had to go to the libary to print labels. I have no printer.  So this so not right. I got the pad for work now I have wait again.   Help please.Thank youBonnie Carter

According to my email, a battery was sent out 10 days ago.  It has not arrived, and when I try to track it, it appears it started it's journey in Secuacus, NJ, and has never left that town!  Looks like USPS handed it over to DHL and the whole system is messed up.  A4C has not contacted me, so I don't know how to resolve.

Review.Titre: I had to file a dispute because my…
Review.Contenu: I had to file a dispute because my package was stuck in the post office forever.I contacted a4c via email and phone... took me 45 minutes on hold... i didnt even get to talk to a rep yet.I still, until now, havent gotten an email response back from a4c.After everything was said and done... and discovered disputed it. I received the package! IT TURNS OUT THEY GAVE ME COMPLETELY WRONG TRACKING.... how does an automated system give wrong tracking #? Shame on you A4C.... bad customer service. First and last purchase ever.

We weren´t aware that this device would not work with our phones. When we looked up the problem, it said that we needed a sleeve to work for our phones to charge. We could not find any more info on where to get the sleeves and the costs!! We now have a product we can´t use and is too costly to send back for a refund!!

I ordered two of the new wifi speakers however when I received my product only one was new and other one was used. It took them 2 days to respond to my email about this situation and by than speakers were sold out. This was my first time ordering from this company and my last.I am very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Decent delivery time, right kind of case but did not fit
Review.Contenu: I orgionally Got a replacement HTC one m8 phone. I went to the phone store sprint for a new case and was told the stores no longer carried the case options that would fit my phone. After doing a quick search in sprint online and having trouble i did a Google search and found one through this site. The Price was decente, and delivery took about a week which is reasonable. The big problem and reason for low ratting, my phone is slighly longer then the case so i cant use the case

Sent defective  solar charger .. does not do what says it is capable  of doing.  Live and learn.  Bought smaller chargers from  a4c before and they workwd .. also bought an ipad keyboard that was great.. this solar charger is a joke,  im not waiting in line at post office driving there for a $15 paper weight solar paper weight actually.. honestly  never again, this company sells defective  items and they take their time shipping, thats something  that i had to point out as well.  Avoid A4C

Review.Titre: I will hesitate to purchase from A4C…
Review.Contenu: I will hesitate to purchase from A4C again.  Received my watch with a scratch.  Support stated the watch was no longer in stock and would offer either a refund if I return or 10% back and keep the watch.  I opted for the 10% back.  2 weeks later still no refund after daily emails.  Buyer beware.

Ordered refurb (not open box) speaker box.  No wall mount included.  Reported and did get a response that one would be sent (7/10).  Inquired again and got response that no update or have not been able to locate item.  (7/17).  Allowed more time for response, none received (7/26).You wanted a review, here you go.

Review.Titre: Misleading picture of the item for sale.
Review.Contenu: Quality of the item that I received is OK, however, the picture was really misleading when I ordered it. This item is actually a wired headphone, but when I placed the order, it shown as a wireless one. I was really disappointed when I received this item to find out that I had been mislead when placing this order.

Review.Titre: I have ordered many things from A4c.com …
Review.Contenu: I have ordered many things from A4c.com before with no problems but my most recent order has been a nightmare so far.  My order was placed on 4/29 but the tracking number provided has been useless. No updates since shipment on 5/2. Hopefully it arrives very soon but if not I won't be ordering from them again.

Review.Titre: The item I ordered was received in a badly damaged envelope and the contents of the order was missing
Review.Contenu: The item I ordered was received with the package badly damage or having been opened and the ordered item missing,  The Post Office pasted two stickers on the envelope stating they received it opened.  I sent an Email to A4C explaining the situation and include pictures of the envelope.  They have yet to provide a response.  Emailed them again with basically the same information and am hopeful they will respond this time.  Asked for the same item if available or a credit to my charge card if unavailable.

My experience wasn’t so good, although it had a satisfactory ending.  I tried very hard to order a product on line, but after providing all my personal information the order wouldn’t go through.  I tried to order by phone, but the call didn’t go through.  It was frustrating, but after I found a customer service link things got better.  After a few emails back and forth, I got one yesterday that provided my with a phone to call to place my order, and the customer service rep did a nice job.  My product has been ordered!

Review.Titre: They prices are awesome but their …
Review.Contenu: They prices are awesome but their product doesn't work even if their paperwork said: "Tested for full functions". I order two times the same device and both had obvious issues, different issues but both really blocking to use the product, so how it can be fully tested but never used at all?

Received a bad iPad Air 2. Had a dent in the back and wouldn't stay connected to WiFi. I had to reset the network every time I turned the darn thing on. As it was refurbished, I see this as poor quality control. The help desk lady did a good job, though I still haven't received my refund.

Review.Titre: Out of stock but still showing item was shipped
Review.Contenu: Bought a surface pen from their website. The shipping information was provided really quickly after the order was placed but didn't update for almost a week. Then, I received an E-mail saying the item was actually out of order and they have to cancel the order. Wasted a week here. Bad management.

The provided product (Ipad)is in bad condition and when I contacted them through email no response. Also when on contacted over the phone in the business hours (Tuesday-4/18/2017) ar 9:30 AM CST) it is saying you contacted after the business hours. No one is there to help for returning my product

i've bought refurb in the past & they look almost brand new, so i assume would be the case: new item found defect, fix then ship out, or someone bought & return without damage & can only sell as refurb, NO, these where beat up & put back wet. at least clean up try to pass them as some what new, ear bud did not fit the chargeing craddle as should, had to squeeze in & yank out with more force then should. didnt charge first time, then now is, pairing was difficult at first, sound quality ok, not great.

a4c's definition of "refurbished" is just "used". Bought a Charge HR from them "refurbished" but the screen has lots of scratches and isn't anything like new. Looks dirty underneath too.Refurbished in my mind is "repaired and looks like new"

Review.Titre: Wrong item shipped and no way to get the correct item
Review.Contenu: Ordered an Apple Watch - Silver case with the white strap.  Item arrived pretty fast.  I open the sealed box but the watch is black case and black strap.  Contacted the company for the correct item to be shipped.  Took 6 days to get the reply and by that time, all the watches had been sold out.  Got the RMA to ship the black one back.  The receipt states Silver - White and the box - Black - Black.  Just a total waste of my time and effort.  Next time will purchase someplace else.  It's been 2 weeks and I still have no watch.

Review.Titre: The Samsung AKG headphone that I…
Review.Contenu: The Samsung AKG headphone that I ordered from A4C does not sound good like the original that came with Samsung phone. The left side of the headphone sounds intermittent. I’m guessing the headphone is not original, that is why the price is less expensive compared to original.

ordered Surface Pro3 to Canadacame but should take in Canada Post on my own - n.p.First.Suraface Pro 3 goes with WiFi - this one what was sent by A4Chad not WiFi adapter at all renewed W10, reset network 2 times - still no adapter at all. can not even install drivers - no device in listSurface Pro 3 as PC works perfectly but no WiFi. Cool.Second.No any stylus included as well as no any mentioningthat it is not included. Should buy for $45 on your own. Cool.Wanted to make this as a gift but how i can make a gift with problem.Cool Guys, Go on.

I ordered a new wireless Samsung charger and it came in opened with the seal removed.  The packaged was smashed and parts were falling out.  The charger does appear to be working and we have all the required parts, but it does not appear to be new.  It appears it may be refurbished.

I ordered an iPad.  iPad arrived NOT functional.  All items are supposed to be confirmed and certified prior to purchase and ship.  Unfortunately, this iPad was not certified and I missed a personal gift-giving date with my Mother.  I hope the 2nd iPad is certified and functional.

Review.Titre: My fault for not being more…
Review.Contenu: My fault for not being more knowledgeable and yours for selling something useless. I was going to send it to electronic recycle, but I will give it to anyone that wants to play with it.I will not recommend A4C to anyone who is not computer saavy. No owners manual?

I bought a Chromo tablet, it is soooooo slow it is not useful, and I have to pay to return it!  I also bought 3 children's smart watches only one works as it should!  I plan on paying to return the crap I bought!.  The customer service rep was awful and not helpful AT ALL!

Have ordered refurbished products form a4c in the past with good results.  Latest order of a fitbit I would categorized as "used".  Markedly scratched up and even dirty.  Request for an rma has gone unanswered.  Will definitely think twice before ordering from a4c again

Review.Titre: Items in stock were not updated
Review.Contenu: Items in stock were not updated.  After ordering and being told it shipped, I was then notified that my item wasn't in stock.  A refund was issued, but I believe that we should've been notified at the time of ordering that the item wasn't in stock.

Review.Titre: Sells not so genuine products. Sad.
Review.Contenu: Although I received the shipment very fast, the Samsung headphones were not genuine as I compared to my original note4 one.  Listening to music on this actually hurts my ears as it's all treble and no bass.  Oh well. I won't be ordering from this place again.

It is very frustrating when you order a single $12 item and receive the wrong one.  At that cost, it isn't even worth the time to hassle with a return.  Instead, I purchased from another vendor ... obviously receiving it later than I had originally wanted to.

Review.Titre: 2 Weeks for the item I order to arrive
Review.Contenu: 2 Weeks for the item I order to arrive.  Multiple emails sent to customer service inquiring about the shipping delays, only one was returned - the rest they ignored.  The website clearly states "5 - 6 business day shipping"

The Surface I ordered was supposed to come with Windows 10, but only came with 8.1. It also will not update properly. I had to contact A4C several times, as they took over 4 days to get back with me. I am now trying to go through PayPal to get things resolved.

I had ordered my son some socks. I ordered them in black and received white instead along with a card stating that the black was out of stock. I oils have liked to be given the option before they were sent out. I would have chosen not to order them at all.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping but the item I've …
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping but the item I've purchased isn't working properly, I've got a car phone charger and when I plug it to my phone I can feel it slows down the discharge however it's not charging and even the charging sign doesn't come up

Review.Titre: Tablet came to me completely dead
Review.Contenu: Tablet came to me completely dead, no charge and the charger doesn't work.  Inconvenient but i can replace charger faster than it would take me to call them.  Test your stuff before u sell it.  Eh, the tablet works so i won't give it one star

Review.Titre: I did not receive correct product and poor customer service …
Review.Contenu: I did not receive the product that I ordered, instead I received a different style/ model of the product. It seemed like whoever was filling the order just put what they had left on the shelf in my box. When I contacted customer service about this the woman I spoke to was totally indifferent to my complaint. She told me the product I ordered was out of stock and I'd get a credit once they received the product back. She had no interest in hearing what I wanted (the correct item sent) and treated me like I was bothering her with my call. If this is how this company does business then I'll take mine elsewhere...

Review.Titre: Got directed to the wrong product
Review.Contenu: A search on Google for "Blu One Life case" led me to a case for HTC One.  I didn't notice the switch (my mistake) and accidentally ordered the wrong product.  I've asked A4C to fix the problem but have not heard back yet as of now.

I was looking for a manual of instructions for a new Amazon Fire Tablet and the Google for your website stated free questions and then $28 per month for future advice.  Even tho I did input my credit card info, I did not sign up for any known charges and now find that there is a pending charge to my credit card for $28, which I will refute.  I recd advice telling me to reboot the tablet.  Big deal as I had tried that many times.  After re-looking at your website, it said refunds would be made for any reason, no questions asked.  I do not want to pay you the $28 nor any future amounts.Thank you,John O'Rourke

I ordered and received a refurbished BOHM head phone set that is supposed to have bluetooth. The bluetooth does not work. I like the sound when using it with a wired connection, but the bluetooth feature would be more convenient.

Bought a refurbished Samsung Gear S2 a month ago ($129) and the heart rate sensor didn't work...had to return it.  Bought a refurbished LG Urbane 2 this week and this time the watch had numerous scratches and didn't work at all (turned on and screen went crazy...jumping from one screen to another) and so I had to return it also. Emailed their support staff but never got a reply...called their customer service and was able to get a return authorization. I bought a refurbished Samsung Gear S2 from Best Buy for  less ($99) and it looked almost brand new.  Sorry, I was really hoping for a better experience...

I ordered a refurbished Pebble Time from A4C. Upon receiving the new watch I sold my old Pebble. Then I noticed that the watch A4C sent me was not working properly. A4C could not offer me an exchange because they were "sold out". It took their customer service a few days but eventually they sent me a return label and AMA number, and processed my return. Now I am without a Pebble watch and will likely end up paying near full retail for one since I need one for work. A4C supposedly refurbished this device and then QC'ed it before sending it out.... Yeah, right. I definitely won't buy from A4C again.

Review.Titre: They sent me used, dirty and smelly band
Review.Contenu: They did not send me refurbished, they sent me used watch. I mean they didn't even bother clean it. I had to clean the edges with a toothpick to get it cleaned...yuck leather wstrap was smeared with someone's sweat. I could smell it eew

I've always been satisfied with A4C's electronics and great prices, lately however they've missed the mark on more than 3 occasions.  I always order Refurbished, but I've been getting "Used" electronics with scratched displays, which I can clearly tell.  If I wanted used, I would have bought it, so I'm not sure what the disconnect is within the company.  What I do know, is that if this continues I will take my business elsewhere & just get a refund instead of sending it all the way back from Afghanistan, which means it takes a month for me to get another tablet with a scratched screen.

Review.Titre: I ordered a refurbished Color Nook
Review.Contenu: I ordered a refurbished Color Nook.  They did not provide the proper plug/adapter to charge the tablet.  Worked 1 time and then quit.  Buyer beware. You will have to buy charger directly from Barnes and Noble for your tablet to charge.

Review.Titre: “Certified Refurbished” OtterBox Venture 65 Quart Cooler (Color: Hudson)
Review.Contenu: Recently received my 65qt cooler but the Dry Storage Tray & Bottle Opener we’re not included inside the cooler. I have attempted to contact A4C, but not heard back. I will update results if/when they respond.

Price was decent. However the final delivery was lacking with poor packing leading to damaged box. Fortunately this was not a gift and the actual merchandise was not damaged but just a poor execution so probably won't order from again.

The camera on Chromo little tablet is terrible the most ridiculous camera I ever seen.If I hadn't got rid of the box I would've returned this garbage I most certainly will not be ordering anything else period...TOTALLY TICKED OFF

On one hand I think I received my iPad in a GREAT amount of time, however I was made to think I would be receiving my entire order. I only received half of my order, which was disappointing but I understand things happen. I contact the company and they tell me they are going to mail the missing item immediately so I wait for the confirmation email. Needless to say I had to reach out to them after I still did not receive any information on the item being shipped. Come to find out the item is on back order. So I request another item and I still have not heard back about that one either. I feel it was a missed opportunity at a great transaction.

Review.Titre: No plans to do business with this company again
Review.Contenu: I talked by phone with a rep called Mark and was disconnected twice/hung up on(?) and the called back several times and was put on hold for up to 30 minutes only to be told to leave a message and couldn't, call disconnected w/o ability to leave a message.  Did a chat with a rep (don't remember name) who also was of no assistance.  Finally a rep (Marco) responded to send back but after the hassle I decided to sell item to someone else and get my money back.  Product seems to be pretty good and I have ordered before with no problem but then I didn't need to return a duplicated item due to confusion with my credit card company and A4C order indicating reorder(?).

Review.Titre: Item shipped did not have all the…
Review.Contenu: Item shipped did not have all the parts. Attempted to contact A4C by phone with no luck except for answering machine. Contacted by email and waiting for a reply. I do expect items to be shipped with all the parts.

I ordered a fitbit but it wasn't working properly so I called to return it and get another item that was higher in price.  I received a shipping label via email so that was good. I didn't have a chance to mail it back right away, but A4c took the money out of my account for my new item right away before they even shipped it out. Now it has been 2 weeks, and they stI'll haven't shipped out my product. They said they haven't received my return but emailed me the tracking information showing that I sent it and it should be there. I did my part, they can see that I sent my return. They took the money out of my account...but still haven't shipped my product!

Ordered 2 wireless phone fast chargers but only one came with the correct fast charger adapter.Tried to leave an honest review on the product to warn potential purchasers but the review has not been posted by A4C.

Called customer support 5 times, each time was asked to leave a message, never heard a reply, Emailed customer suppor, 3 times, never head a reply even though the website promised a response within 24 hours .

The product was as advertised but had a terrible shipping experience. Customer service took 2 days to respond but luckily i was able to get UPS to resolve issue. Will not recommend and will not shop here again.

After hearing good things about this site from a colleague, I decided to give it a try and ordered two Apple Ear Buds. After I ordered, I was unable to get any tracking information from the USPS tracking number provided. After a few days, I called customer services, had to suffer through some really awful music while waiting, and after about 8 minutes, the phone hung up. I called customer service again the next morning and after about 2 minutes, a nice lady offered to replace the earbuds and send them expedited shipping. I never received a confirmation email with another USPS tracking number though. And, after nearly two weeks, I still don't have the daggone earbuds. Needless to say, I am not pleased.

Review.Titre: Item ordered and was shown in stock
Review.Contenu: Item ordered and was shown in stock, ordered was canceled and got refunded. A4C said it was out of stock.Item is shown as in stock on website the whole time, and it is still shown in stock.

Review.Titre: The headphones are extremely poor quality.
Review.Contenu: The headphones I purchased from A4C are very poor quality. The headphones  automatically initiate Siri commonds on my Iphone even without pressing any key.Will never recommend the headphones to Anyone.
I purchased a used Ipad. After one week, the tracking showed it never left the first location. I called and they promised to ship another one. Another week has gone by & I have heard nothing further.
I received  a product that does not work and I do not like the product. I emailed about 2 weeks ago and I have not heard any response. I just emailed again and I will wait to see if I get a response

Review.Titre: My order was accepted and charged
Review.Contenu: My order was accepted and charged, but several days later I was informed the product was actually out of stock.  My account was promptly credited, but I can't recoup my time.  Disappointing.
The ipad came fairly quickly, The screen was separating from the device. Poor quality control for being labeled as  refurbished, Sent ipad back today.The return and refund seem to be going Ok so far.

Shipment is horrible. From 11/22/2023 to Dec 1st, 2023. This happened twice. It takes 8 days for shipment from Texas to North Carolina. There has to be a better way of easing the frustration of the consumer. The items purchased are in great condition & the price is very reasonable but the hassle of shipment takes the joy of expecting your new gadgets OUT. I still recommend A4C, because my dilemma may not be your dilemma.

Review.Titre: Old product (clearly long on shelf) marketed as “new”
Review.Contenu: I bought the MOPHIE power station (new) as a birthday gift for my brother and upon receipt I found that the product packaging (not the shipment packaging) was in poor condition (torn, faded, wrinkled). I did not open up the package as it is a gift, but I hope the product itself is in good condition.
After 3 months the headphones stopped working,  I can conet them to my Bluetooth any more , I did all the reecet settings in my phone, but nothing was happening

Review.Titre: Disappointed about a defect in right…
Review.Contenu: Disappointed about a defect in right earbud...I asked for replacement and I have to ship the earbuds back at my expense for a refund.These should have been checked for defects before shipping. I am not pleased,will never use this company again.

The sound is great from the ear pods but the ear pods have trouble staying in my ears. If I have them on and start moving around the left one slides out then the right one follows. I’ve also changed the different covered that came included and I’m still having the same issues. I think I’m going to return them. The sounds great and noise cancellation, but if they can’t stay in my ears no point having them.
Ordered a small item and that got shipped without extra padding, the item box got smushed. Fortunately nothing broke.
When listening to music - sound quality is adequate, but when making calls - I get lots of white noise and interference, it’s very annoying since it’s hard to hear

Review.Titre: Original tws Packaging was damaged when…
Review.Contenu: Original tws Packaging was damaged when it came .. it had a hole near the tws as if some tried to pull it out.. But so far no issues with TWS..it's working fine

Review.Titre: Product description is what it is.
Review.Contenu: Product description is what it is.Using DHL as carrier delayed shipment

Review.Titre: First time using this site but my…
Review.Contenu: First time using this site but my purchase was seamless and arrived in two days. Would shop again.

Review.Titre: I still don't know why the charger came without a plug.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a cordless charger for my phone. It arrived with a power cord  but no plug.
Due to a misunderstanding with the delivery carriers my order was returned without an attempt to reach me for address verification.

Review.Titre: Did not honor the 90 day warranty
Review.Contenu: They sent to order out quickly, but the refurbished product did not work. When I called the refurbished warranty group they said they were not honoring the refurbished warranty and sent me a return label. So basically if you really need the product you may want to order two. I asked the person where it said that a4c would not honor the 90 day replacement and they responded that's just our policy right now.

I ordered a tablet through A4C rather than amazon because of good experiences in the past. I was disappointed with the delayed shipping. It took almost 2 weeks to get my tablet. Had I known it would have taken that long I would have just ordered through amazon. The device itself was as described and works well. Good products slow service.

When I ordered my item I was not asked or advised that a signature would be required when delivered to my residence. I had to leave unexpectedly and noticed from the UPS tracking that it was not delivered due to no one to sign for the package,  I emailed A4C and asked to have it held until I returned but this was neither acknowledged nor relayed to UPS. I did return in time to go to the UPS station to pick up my item.

-I recived the incorrect Apple watch model-The model of the Apple  I purchased was not stated in the adverstiment.-There a no pictures of used products so the customer can adequately understand the condition of the product.-Customer service was slow to repond to my request to return the incorrect model watch I recived.-Once customer service did respond they were quick, curteous and accomadating.

Review.Titre: Got here quick enough but the exchange…
Review.Contenu: Got here quick enough but the exchange and return was a bit different. I received the merchandise on November 15th and did not get a respond back for a return until December 5th after two emails and never reaching in my phone. this part of your service could improve a bit otherwise the merchandise was in good shape just was the wrong one for my phone

Review.Titre: I’ve been happy with A4C in the past
Review.Contenu: I’ve been happy with A4C in the past. This time my experience was a little less than desirable. I ordered two FitBit watches about a week apart. The second one didn’t come with a wall charger the first one did. They explained to me in the description it said comes with watch and cable. Fine, but you can imagine my shock when I didn’t receive one as I did before. Why would I check the description a week later for the same item?

Review.Titre: My order was confirmed and then cancelled
Review.Contenu: My order was confirmed and I got tracking number for shipment, but later after a week I got email that my order is canceled. That’s bad as I told my son he is getting headphones.If they cancelled before or not charged my credit and not gave tracking number I would have not told my son. The reason I gave three stars is they refunded amount without me calling.

Received my soundbar on time as scheduled, but the included batteries were missing, and the bottom quarter of the remote was damaged and the remote itself does not work, as though it had been tampered with.I attempted to contact the manufacturer for a replacement to no avail. The remote itself also isn't available for purchase. Would like it replaced.

Review.Titre: Everything was great but I realized …
Review.Contenu: Everything was great but I realized that the shipping address was incorrect and after reaching out to customer service, I was told there is no way for them to correct and I had to try to reroute it with DHL and USPS myself...but the method of shipping doesn’t allow for any changes and I’m still trying to get ahold of someone at the local post office to attempt to have it forwarded or returned to sender.

Ordered Apple Nike watch at great price for a gift. When it arrived, the watch in box was not color ordered or what was listed on label on box. Checked order history. Confirmed I did not make an error when I placed the order. Found that it was not my error. Discovered that watch I had wanted was now out of stock. Called immediately. They were closed for weekend. Left message indicating issue and requested call back to sort it out.  No one has returned my call. Very disappointing.

I purchased two items a refurb gearfit 2 watch and a samsung wireless fast charger. The charger works great and I got a good deal on it. However, the reason for the 3 stars is that the gearfit 2 arrived broken. The watch its self was in great condition but none of the apps would load, and after 4 hours of having the watch the screen stopped coming on. I ended up returning the watch the next day.

I had purchased a LG Urbane W150 smart watch but the charging cradle provided was for the older model W110 and the w150 is slightly smaller than the W110. This made chaging the watch almost impossible to align the pins with the watch. So I found one on Amazon that said it was compatible with my watch and while it did work that was another $12 to the cost along with several hours of my time researching what was wrong.

I cannot rate the product because I have yet to receive it as of 9/23. Ordered on 9/13, was notified via email product “shipped” on 9/14. Was given a projected delivery date of 9/23, but product still has not arrived. I was looking for other options to buy gear from besides Amazon, but this experience has me reconsidering that. May not buy from here any longer. Disappointed.

Review.Titre: I expected better condition for a …
Review.Contenu: I expected better condition for a refurbished device.  Scratches on the screen and typical wear at the bottom edges where the device would normally be propped up when using the kickstand. Some scratches on the back of the device. Does work well so far.  I wouldn't purchase a refurbished product again in my personal opinion from A4.  Same feeling as purchasing from a private seller on Craigslist.

Review.Titre: S7 Edge Battery Charging Case and VR
Review.Contenu: The battery charging case for the Samsung S7 Edge is in good physical shape, but since it was "pre-owned" and not refurbished or even tested it seems, I cannot get anywhere near a full charge or even half a charge of the phone with it.  Could still come in handy, but kind of disappointed.I have not had a chance to test the VR headset yet, but I don't see any reason why it wouldn't work since it appears to be in good physical shape.T

Review.Titre: Don't Spend the Extra $ on Shipping
Review.Contenu: I ordered a product on Wednesday morning and requested two day shipping (at an additional expense). The product wasn't shipped until Friday (the day I expected the order to arrive). I received the product a week after I placed the initial order. I emailed customer service to complain. Customer service at A4C refunded me for the additional shipping expense and apologized for the delay.

Review.Titre: Wrong color sent but product was great
Review.Contenu: I ordered headphones and shipping speed take at least a week. After waiting a week I received wrong color. I was on a time constraint so I could not return. Headphones were in very good condition. Warranty policy in my opinion is a bit weird. A4C card states that you must keep barcode sticker on the product or it voids warranty. Its a bit weird to walk around with a sticker on your all black headphones.

I needed to return a defective item and the lady answering the phone had no idea how to help me. I was placed on hold for at least 10 minutes and then disconnected. I called again and got a better response but was told I could not get a replacement as they were no longer in stock and to callback in 2-3 weeks and maybe they would have them. I decided to ask for a refund and order from somewhere that knew how to handle my order.

Everything went smoothly and quickly.  Easy interface to work with.We were on vacation when we ordered and payed for expedited shipping.  We allowed a couple of extra days as a cushion.  The package never arrived.  We had to leave and have no idea what happened to the items we ordered. This may be no fault of the vendor, but the shippers, do not know where the ball got dropped.

I purchased 2 Samsung wireless fast chargers and a Samsung gear s2.  The fast chargers work fine and the watch works as well.  The wireless charger that came with the watch doesn't work.  I messaged the support on the website regarding this issue over 24 hours ago and have not received a response.  I was able to use the watch for one day before it died with no charger

Review.Titre: Nice product, lacking in customer service
Review.Contenu: Great product, once it was received.  The system generated the product to be sent to the wrong home.  Customer service took their time about addressing the situation, while I was very concerned about where the $200 product might be located.  Would love to purchase again because once I received the product, it worked great, but based on the experience, I simply cannot.

Usually everything goes great, but this time the tablet I ordered was supposed to have T-Mobile service but the one I got had Sprint service.  I did contact support but was told I could return it or keep it as they had no TMobile tablets left.  I kept it and it's in great condition, but would have liked to have the right cell service on it.

I sent multiple emails regarding shipping issues with no response from the company (yes I checked spam box).  Because I received no response I purchased a different product and requested the original item be cancelled. To my surprise the item ended up on my doorstep two days later so I then had to pay to return it.

Review.Titre: I ordered a refurbished iPad but when I …
Review.Contenu: I ordered a refurbished iPad but when I received it I couldn't even charge it. I had to send it back in and wait for another one. When I called customer service they didn't even say sorry or apologize. All they asked was if I wanted a refund or another one. Doesn't help that had problems with USPS delivering it either. It was supposed to be for present which now I have to get something else. I guess we will see when the replacement gets here if it works.

I ordered a certain style of ear buds and I got a different style than the image I was shown and those weren't the ones I wanted if I wanted style(2) that I received I would have gotten it elsewhere but the original style I wanted(1) was hard to find at a cheap price which is why I ordered it originally

Review.Titre: I recently puchased a galaxy gear s3 …
Review.Contenu: I recently puchased a galaxy gear s3 though the site, but when i received it, it wouldnt turn on. The return process was simple but they where out of stock for a replacement so i had to go to another supplier. Everything was smooth for the return, I would have prefered a replacement , or the original to work preferably.

Review.Titre: Bought what was advertised as a 64gb…
Review.Contenu: Bought what was advertised as a 64gb iPad.  When it arrived, I was shocked to find out it was a 16gb model.  I called the company to complain and was offered the explanation that they "must have been out of the 64gb model."  No apology whatsoever.When they couldn't locate the model I wanted, I returned it to them.  It took 2 phones calls and 2 trips to the post office since the rep failed to include the postage in the first email.I did get my money back, but I will NOT be shopping with them again.

Review.Titre: Mixed Because Of What I Purchased But I Would Not Rule Them Out To Try Again.
Review.Contenu: I gave 3 stars because there is no separation to rate vendor vs. item purchased. The A4C shopping and purchasing experiences were fine! Prices are good and shipping was timely. However, the "Silicone Heat Resistant Gloves" I purchased, for half the price amazon charges, are a different story. Can only hold a hot pan for a few seconds before your hand starts feeling the heat.For anyone reading this who is considering buying from this vendor, I would say give them a try. Just know what you are buying.

Good things: Design and feel, waths faces, display, WiFi connection.Average: it's water resistant not water proof, no NFCLimitations: it's not capable of working off sync with phone for steps,and activity tracker. When synced with phone activity is overwritten with phone info.You could only place call on your phone, can't answer on your wrist.New tjing, I have seen heart rate even for computer table in this watch. Asked for replacement, hope I get product in which heart rate sensor works...

Although my order appeared to ship almost immediately the updated information was lacking for almost a week.  Until I finally got through to a customer service agent who informed me to track through a fourth party rather than the third party provided.  Shipment took almost the full 7 business days to arrive.

There is no doubting your great deals I have ordered several items in the past year. However the shipping has a lot to be desired. Ordered on the 22nd didn't ship unit the 27th...no updates on USPS site until it arrived in my city and was delivered on the 1st.Great deals but don't be in a hurry!

I purchased two refurbished smart watches, and upon receipt of them both, and upon initial set up, we discovered that they both needed access codes for them to work. After contacting the company, I was advised that they didn't have the access codes, so basically the watches were useless. They did offer a refund though. Giving them another shot,I purchased two refurbished tablets. We haven't tried setting them up yet, so I don't know if I'll still have the same issues as I did with the watches.

Review.Titre: Minor scratches on the watch - updated
Review.Contenu: Function wise 100% satisfied!Updated on November 9, 2016Resolution Centre approached me, and we exchanged emails back and forth for a couple of days. All went smoothly until the Refund - Customer Services dept screwed up. If they hadn't screwed up, I would have upgraded the ratings to 5/5 and left a shinning review for A4C.COM and their amazing customer service. I had to correct their mistake and it left a bit of bad taste in my mouth. Will still purchase products from A4C.COM but with extra caution.

Review.Titre: Your company is fine but I will be se 2 …
Review.Contenu: Your company is fine but I will be se 2 tablets back. 1 the battery drains overnight when shut off.  The second one hangs so long then finally lets you use it till you login somewhere and the tablet freezes again. You are the seller and not the remanufacturer. I think the product is old and garbage.

Have used twice.  First item was as advertised, good value but painfully slow shipping on the "flat rate".  Second item hasn't arrived still.  It sits for days and days and days at one location with no apparent movement.  Be prepared for incredibly slow shipping if you use flat rate.

Review.Titre: Good communication, fast shipping, terrible quality.
Review.Contenu: Received my 2-pack of headphones shortly after placing the order. Shipping was fast and free. Received only 1 working pair of headphones and  those were probably the worst headphones I've ever purchased. Not entirely the fault of the seller, but they shouldn't carry such garbage products.

I received a defective product, but customer rep was willing to send me a replacement. I would have given 4 stars if i did not have to send in the replacement first. This delays the processing, as normally other vendors send me a replacement without having to receive the defective product first.

Review.Titre: The product didn't work on my phone as…
Review.Contenu: The product didn't work on my phone as stated in the description. Also had to pay to return the items.  Still waiting on my refund. The product was nice, but was not compatible.  Customer service replied quickly but not willing to cover the return shipping.

Review.Titre: It took awhile, but great product and packaging!
Review.Contenu: It's been more than 10 days since I got an email saying my order shipped. Five days after, the tracking showed it left it's point of origin, in New Jersey. I am in NE GA, that was 4 days ago, no updates since.Update! Package arrived,  fantastic packaging,  great product. Happy ending.

Item ordered was close but not exactly what I needed or what was described. The Samsung Iconx tips I ordered were actually for the Galaxy Buds. There is a slight difference but enough that it's a difficult fit for the Iconx buds. The shipping was fast, though.

fast shipping but faulty merchandise email them to try and ship it back and get a replacement because I was still going to order the same unit they said no that they are only currently doing refunds so I returned the merch now waiting on my refund

I had shopped and bought 2 items with A4c in a month, 1st wrong item was sent and when I called them they said it was out of stock so they refunded.2nd the item was not working as it should, called them, and they said it was out of stock.There must be a problem with there internal communications and the items they post on their website regarding having it in stock or not.Anyways they are quick in sending a return slip and refund, i was thinking that they are used to returns thats why they're fast with returns and refunds which is good.

While I got a tracking number it took 4 days before seeing that the package was actually on its  way.  When finally the tracking number showed up in the report the package also arrived.  Since the delivery was by USPS maybe sending the item directly with USPS was faster than with DHL.

I'm happy with the product I just had a problem getting it on time and tracking it I paid extra for it to be delivered early but for some reason it was sent by regular mail and a week later, I called in and still could not get tracking information or location info I was going to cancel when I finally got it . when ordering make sure you stay on top of ur order n if u pay extra it's probably good u make sure it's been shipped out and don't just go off of the email that they send you because I got 1 but my order was never sent out until I called about it.

Review.Titre: Product Shipped Was Not as Described
Review.Contenu: Product was described as Refurbished - In Immaculate, Like New Condition.  When I received the product, it had scratches on the front face and back clasp and had signs of fairly heavy use.  I was disappointed with the condition since it was not as described on the site and have asked for an RMA to return and get a refund.  They have sent a pre-paid label and assuming this process goes smoothly, I at least appreciate their willingness to take the product back at their cost.  If this process does not go smoothly, hopefully I have the chance to update this review.

Review.Titre: Customer service not a top priority
Review.Contenu: I thought I had found my new go-to place for electronics online and ordered an item with limited description: "Includes 6 different adapter rings to fit wide range of lens' models." As it turns out, it did not fit my lens. As the description was off, and not entirely customer error, I was hoping A4C would be willing to pay for return shipping or at least split the cost. I got impatient answers saying they simply would not provide a return label. Then I received an e-mail to rate my experience, which I am now doing. I am unlikely to give A4C another chance.

Review.Titre: Good product but poor communication and defective email.
Review.Contenu: I purchased some headphones and was sent an email with a tracking number which didn't work and the email content about my order was scrambled with all the characters along the right side in a vertical column.  I sent the company an email because I was unable to track the shipment.  The USPS number said it left their facility but 8 days later I still am waiting for it and the tracking number was never updated.  I sent an email to the company which was never answered.  On the next day the product arrived and I am happy with it.  Too bad there was other issues with this sale.

Review.Titre: Its supposed to be a fast charger for …
Review.Contenu: Its supposed to be a fast charger for my S8. But it doesn't fast charge. Probably because the Sent a regular plug with it instead of a fast charger plug. I noticed this same setup brand new for $2 more. I'm kicking myself in the A$s for not buying new

Received my product in a timely manner, however my headphones weren’t working! They could not even turn on or get charged. My first experience. The support team was able to reach back to me with a return label to ship it back for free thanks.

Review.Titre: I have made several purchases with …
Review.Contenu: I have made several purchases with varying degrees of success. I will still consider them for refurbished equipment.  But last purchase was really badly packaged (no protection inside) and the good was roughed up.  Works Ok. But the looks are not great.

I finally 

Review.Titre: The first one that arrived was a …
Review.Contenu: The first one that arrived was a defective product. But however, the customer service was great and they immediately sent a replacement and that seems to be good so far. But I am  still in the testing phase and will keep it if it works fine for a week.

Good product, reasonable price, but item was not delivered and had to go through the inconvenience of picking it up from a drop off location. UPS did not make a second attempt for this seller, all other seller's items get up to 3 delivery attempt!

Purchased the Moto360 watch. but it stopped working within a week pf purchase. had to goto buffalo to return to avoid paying duties. i did get a replacement watch but it looks used and is in a much worse aesthetic condition than the previous one.

Review.Titre: Made a purchase and found an alternate…
Review.Contenu: Made a purchase and found an alternate product that interested me more. Contacted IMMEDIATELY before product shipped. Received NO reply from A4C. At all. Product arrived and is good condition. Customer Service needs improvement

Review.Titre: Your order website was a horror
Review.Contenu: Your order website was a horror, the “verify you are not a robot” made me do it 50 x. Very frustrating and so much time wasted. The deal was good , the product is good, the delivery was good, the order process was insanity producing!

Review.Titre: Great price but Verizon doesn't support…
Review.Contenu: Great price but Verizon doesn't support the activation of the smartwatch anymore so this transaction was a waste of time. Great customer service though. Because of that reason I will consider to make future purchases from you all.

I found this company several months ago when I needed to replace a cell phone battery.  Had I known that I would need to replace the charger later on, I would have ordered both at the same time.  Nonetheless, I was glad to finally receive the subsequent order of the charger.  I will qualify that after a couple of failed attempts in ordering the new charger which was out of stock, I finally stumbled across the refurbished chargers that were in inventory that sold for a dollar less.  I  tagged to be notified when the new models are restored in inventory, but in the meantime this rebuilt charger works fine.  The cell phone is fully charged now.

Watch was described as refurbished. While it arrived entirely functional and in good cosmetic shape, I was disappointed that the band was not from the manufacturer. The product photo showed an all black watch band.  Instead, a third party watchband was supplied with blue and pink dots. As a male, the pink and blue dots are not my preference. I purchased another watchband to wear instead of sending product back for refund. The description of the product had no description of the band provided other than "medium". Overall, functional and in good shape, but was surprised to not have the original band or at least original all-black band color.

My wire cracked after a week of using the product. Also the battery pack over heats and after a while it overheats my cellphone. Honestly the only thing that is good is that you can recharge twice your phone in one battery pack.

I bought a refurbished Otterbox Symmetry ipad 2 folio case from A4C.  No instructions were included and I couldn't find any on the web.  After inserting the iPad into the case, I noticed it wouldn't automatically turn on or off after opening/closing the case. Also the case closure flap wouldn't stay down.  I sent A4C support a request for a refund and received NO answer. However, I discovered yesterday that after rotating the iPad 180 degrees (the iPad can rotate in the case 360 degrees) the on/off feature and flap are working perfectly.  So the case magnets are happy now and I'm happy now, but I'm somewhat miffed at A4C's failure to respond.

Great Value for item purchased.. but I expect better communication and status updates..  tracking numbers only track with global DHL not DHL.. USPS does not track until local arrival..  order was in limbo for a number of days....

Review.Titre: This company could have gotten 5 stars
Review.Contenu: This company would have gotten 5 stars; however, nowadays I don't want to go through pain in the neck circumstances – like mailing back any items – and I  certainly don't want to pay for postage if it is a companies mistake. The short story is that I used the search bar and got several items coming up. I utilized a very specific set of parameters for the product I wanted, Yet I got the wrong product sent to me. All the parameters I searched for came up, but one. To be honest, this has happened on Amazon.com as well – but they take responsibility for it in return product.This customer service representative did not take responsibility for the companies search bar issue.

Loved watch, but charger didn't work.They were sold out so I had to buy a 24.00 Samsung charge to charge it. I bought the S3 Classic refurbished. The watch works hreat,feel A4C should refund cost of Samsung charget.

Unfortunately, my first experience buying an iPad 2 from A4C was not the most satisfying.  I was excited by the Cyber deal of course, but the iPad, although possibly packaged sufficiently,  was damaged slightly during shipping.  The back has a ding in it and the screen was scuffed up.  I was very shocked when I removed it from the box.  I know stuff happens, but I am disappointed, especially since it took a week to get to me in Charlotte, NC from Brooklyn, NY.  I did reach out to their warranty team, but I am still waiting for them to supply me return and exchange information so I can get an undamaged iPad as quickly as possible since I use an iPad for my music charts.
You are not able to use the touch screen when the screen protector is on.  The screen freezes up  and you aren’t able to do anything.  It is also hard to hear the other person on the phone line:

Review.Titre: Shipping was not as quick as initially …disappointed....
Review.Contenu: Shipping was not as quick as initially stated....packaging could have been better,  tracking via USPS not good at all , nothing concrete until very last minute......Again so much for ...in rain n shine et etc.....

Review.Titre: Delivery was a bit slow. Merch exactly as advertised.
Review.Contenu: Delivery was a bit slow. Ordered on the 9th, received on the 23rd. I had to email to get it rolling. Might have been DHL's glitch though.The Item received in perfect condition, and exactly as advertised.

So far not so good. I haven't received my package yet. I would rather pay for shipping and receive it..thanks not pay and have it delayed. Not able to reach customer service so I'm just sitting and waiting.

Product was what I wanted but trying to purchase it was frustrating.  I didn't want to set up an account but finally had to.  It would have been nice to have that information when I started the purchase.

The product I ordered was significantly less expensive here, but shipping from NY to NJ (30 miles) was very slow. I called to ask about the status of my delivery and the customer service rep was not helpful.
If i could change my mind i would. The tablets came fast but one loses charge too fast and loads even slower. I wouldn't recommend at all and frankly I'd like to send it back and get my money back.
I've ordered from A4C before and had no issues. But my last purchase was disappointing because the refurbished item I bought did not work. I'm currently in the process of returning it for a refund.

Review.Titre: Item is good but no original packing and manual for Refurbished?
Review.Contenu: Bought the Ipad as Refurbished but received only the device and charge cable. Though item looks new but with some tiny scraps and marks on edge and back. Doubt it's used. Guess won't buy from A4C

The item was received in a timely matter. However, the screen, which was replaced, does not even come close to sitting flush with the case and the home button gets stuck when not pushed straight down.

The good: I ordered online 2 refurbished ipad for Christmas and they were delivered promptly. One was not working well and once I called, a return label was sent promptly.  I was refunded my money within a week or two.The bad: The same ipad was out of stock, so I checked the "notify me when back in stock" box. I never got that that notification, but I watched each day and it came back into stock. I ordered online, paid for it and got a confirmation number and UPS tracking #. My money was taken within a day. When I noticed that wasn't being shipped, I called & was told it was really out of stock. It took another week or more to get my money back. I will not reorder again online, but only via phone with a real person.

The sync dock arrived broken.  It's likely because it comes in a zip-lock bag without a box, and it's shipped in a weakly protected paper envelop.  Even though it was a bargain, I can't believe brand name product (kensington) would be shipped in zip-lock bag.  This is one of my most disappointing online shopping experiences.update 10/30/2016:  I was contacted by customer service and they offered a free replacement.  The dock still arrived in zip-lock bag, in the same kind of bubble envelop.  Fortunately, it is not broken this time.  Revising the rating for very good customer service, but takes 1 star off for the initial frustration, and another star off for how they ship product with inadequate protection in packaging.
I received original unit and was not working left vm no one got back to me until I called a 2nd time and spoke to someoneIt should have been sent overnite to me in NJ from Brooklyn but wasn't

Review.Titre: The daily email  I got with a specific…
Review.Contenu: The daily email  I got with a specific item was hard to find on your website at the "same price" advertised. I wound up buying same item at higher price. A little bait and switch
Customer service is almost nonexistent. No reply to my emails or calls to customer service where I kept getting a recording during business hours. I left messages twice... no response.
Package did not arrive for several weeks, so I contacted Customer Service. They determined the shipment was lost and are now sending me a replacement. Raised my rating from 1-3 as a result.

I had a hard time giving 3 stars.  I wanted to give 2 but I am trying cut A4C a break.  I recall seeing other reviews suggesting that it is not a reliable place from which to get refurbs due to poor quality control.  I recently got a couple of refurbished Alexa dots.  The packaging was OK but in retrospect I should have gotten them from Amazon for $5 more.  I did get one that way and the extra money was worth piece of mind.  You see, I ordered an Asus tablet refurb from A4C in the past that didn't even work out of the box.   I swore to not use them again.  I always stick to my word on such matters.  I ordered the dots on accident, having forgotten the original source of the Asus tablet.  In short, I don't recommend A4C.  They have a 1.5 rating on reseller ratings.  Check it out.

Review.Titre: The Samsung Gear 2 watch I ordered …
Review.Contenu: The Samsung Gear 2 watch I ordered seems to have a faulty battery because it will not maintain a charge longer than 5 hours. I have to constantly put it on the charger throughout the day.

Review.Titre: The shipping was slower than most …
Review.Contenu: The shipping was slower than most sellers I deal with.  The product broke after less than 2 months of minimal use.  The price was cheap so I guess that's what you get for a bargain.
I did everything the instructions said to do in order for the battery to keep a charge.  It will not hold  a charge any better than my old one. Wouldn't recommend this purchase.

Review.Titre: Their was no paperwork or any kind of…
Review.Contenu: Their was no paperwork or any kind of instructions on how to operate our fitbit.  We are 80 years old and expected at least some paperwork on how to operate or use this fitbit.

It's okay.  The design isn't the greatest as the back wheels keep hitting the toddlers heels. The seat also sits low so it doesn't provide enough height to kick off with feet.  This would be great for very very young toddler if their motor skills are developed and coordinated enough due to the size of the product. My toddler is on the small size and this is a bit small for his use due to reasons above.  Also the back wheels looks like it can be folded like the front for easy low profile storing but if it can, then I haven't been able to figure it out how.  For the front wheels there's a clearly marked push slide button.The only great thing is, this is a refurb but it looks completely new.  Maybe I can pass it on to my nephew so he can start using it at a much younger age.
All my prior experience with A4C has been very positive. The last purchase  has some issues. The tablet has an Android OS that severely limits various functions. i expected more.
The company promptly shipped what I ordered and the transaction was easy.

I bought a refurbished charger. Came in looking new, but presented poor performance and upon closer inspection the ports were corroded and wasn’t acceptable. A4C responded quickly and issued a return form (prepaid) and gave a full refund. Very good customer service. I will definitely use them in the future.
Shipped very quickly. Website very easy to navigate. Broad range of options.

Review.Titre: Good deal, but missing mounting screws?
Review.Contenu: I bought a Ring Gen. 2 motion sensor.  It was on sale and shipped quickly.  It connected to the Ring hub with no problem, but there were not mounting hardware (screws and wall anchors).  In the past, I have always received mounting screws and anchors.  Maybe, Ring is no longer supplying them?  It wasn't a deal breaker for me as I have them.

Review.Titre: I purchased the speaker for my…grandson
Review.Contenu: I purchased the speaker for my grandson's 12th birthday.  I was very anxious regarding the quality because I read so many negative comments.  I worried he would need help setting it up.  Well ... 12-y/o's are much smarter than this gram.  Less than 5 minutes he had it working.  The sound is terrific.  I'm thinking of getting one for myself!!

Review.Titre: On time at a good price
Review.Contenu: On time, we’ll worth coming back. Items arrived in a plain secure envelope and was carefully sealed and separated.

Review.Titre: Generally good service with minor hiccups
Review.Contenu: I continue to use a4c after many years for buying Apple Watches and other genuine accessories. This time, I was sent a defective Apple AirPods Pro unit. However, I saw the defect as covered under Apple's own quality program and was able to get the unit exchanged. However, it is a negative that a4c sent out the defective unit in the first place (i.e. it easily passed their quality "checks"). Plus the hassle of having to do this in the first place. In any case, the products are genuine and a very good discount. Generally pleased with the purchase.

Had no issue with my order.  Shipping time was a little longer than I was used to, but it wasn’t a big issue.  Item seems as described.  Based on this experience I would buy at A4C again, although I do think it’s a weird name.

Review.Titre: Item came as described, but shipping could be better
Review.Contenu: Item came as described, but later than expected. If they had a better shipping estimate, I would have given another star
Good price, great product.  Shipping not as fast as the bigger players but fast enough for this purpose.

Review.Titre: I was impressed with the prompt…
Review.Contenu: I was impressed with the prompt response, and the friendly customer service.
Good product, easy delivery and timely.
Gets quite hot while charging, but does what is meant too.

4.5 stars. Products shipped quickly and items as described. Only complaint is that I bought my first Lifeproof case, which came with some sort of key to open it but there were no instructions on how to use it properly. Thankfully, we figured it out without damaging the case. Aside from that minor detail, very satisfied with purchase and will definitely purchase from again.

Review.Titre: Cant expect much from a4c poor but passing
Review.Contenu: Bluetooth device I bought was a return or used unit but seems ok for under $20. Some dirty some scuffs but guess i expected  it.  Do get some static when volume exceeds 45% but was under $20 so il deal with it. Shipping took a long time and it was packed poorly. In fact was rolling around in package  like it was just tossed in package and shipping label attached. I purchased a battery charger before from them it broke 3 weeks into use so I dont expect much from this company.

Product was exactly as advertised.  I really like having a large flat charging surface for charging my phone.  My old little round charging pad was difficult to find the sweet spot to start charging.  The Lyft pad seems to work if I simply get close to one of the two charging centers. Shipping on the other hand took longer than I typically have happen (..but it was free shipping!).

Review.Titre: I purchased a Smart watch twice from…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Smart watch twice from A4C and both turned out to be defective in exactly the same way. They would not sync to the computer. A4C was very gracious and did issue a return goods authorization plus the appropriate credit. My only issue was that it required several attempts to get the second RMA.  I do plan to use this site again since they do have good prices on a wide range of items.

Great price. Item did arrive damaged and unuseable. Contacted them through email and they responded the next day. Gave me the option for a replacement or refund. Requested a replacement so they sent an email with a prepaid mailing label. I did have the  hassle of going to USPS for return. I did get my replacement and it works great. Should have better quality control in shipping dept hence only 4 stars.

Review.Titre: Price and products are great, shipping through USPS is terrible!
Review.Contenu: I think the product and cost are exceptionally good so that is a 5 star rating.  However, the shipping through USPS is letting down the service because they lost the package, then found it, then delivered it to the wrong address, then recovered it, then delivered it to me, then had no record of delivering it to me.  It was a shambles and caused too much headache.  Just because of that, I would order from Amazon, as they rarely use USPS and the tracking is excellent.

Review.Titre: Thank you for making this purchase possible
Review.Contenu: The LG Gpad is awesome and I'm very grateful to have it. The ONLY reason I couldn't give 5 stars was because of the charger cord that accompanied it. Within two days the charger cord wouldn't work and I had to get a different one on my own. Now that I have gotten the new cord everything is wonderful.
