I will buy from you again and I have shared my experience with my friends so that they can peruse your site also. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Happy customer, but request that A4C review its online ordering software
Review.Contenu: Product value was outstanding.  Product quality, packaging, delivery speed were outstanding.  Overall, a great transaction.I'd only suggest that the A4C folks do some test orders on their own site.  I had to log in several times to get the order to process.  This added frustration to the process, and I was concerned about how many items I had ordered as a result of the interface challenges.  Other than that one issue, though, the experience was outstanding.

Review.Titre: Package took over a week to arrive
Review.Contenu: Package took over a week to arrive, but arrived in great shape. The reason for the rating of 3 stars and not higher is it came without any instructions! I had to go to YouTube just to figure out what the parts were and how to pair the Bluetooth.Even though refurbished, it sounds great, but there still should have been at least rudimentary instructions in with Tap. I've gone to Amazon's website and there are no free downloads of instructions are available.

Review.Titre: A4C would have rated a 5 star rating if…
Review.Contenu: A4C would have rated a 5 star rating if they would have been able to fulfill my order.  I ordered and paid for an item, only to find out later that it was "out of stock."  A4C did immediately issue a refund to my credit card, but I question the ability to place an order if the item is not available.

The buying experience was flawless.  I was a little disappointed in the product itself.  The sound quality and comfort of use was fantastic but the battery life is really, really low.  My fault there though, I didn't research to product due to being overwhelmed by the awesome price!  The literature in the product box was spot on as to what the battery life would be.  No deception or anything like that, I just hoped for more than 2 1/2 hours of use between charging.

I have purchased from A4C over the years and have found this site to offer reliable products. My reason for not giving a 5 rating is because of "price creep".  I have purchased the same/similar items and have seen the prices rise a lot (even for refurbished). However, whenever I buy - the product has been very reliable.

Review.Titre: Good sound. Less than perfect packaging.
Review.Contenu: Item (BÖHM B3 Soundbase) was received in a timely fashion. The packaging was minimal (only primary box that had no protection for the center of the box) and arrived a little “crushed”.  However the speaker was undamaged. Good sound. A nice improvement over built in speakers. Perfect for our small bedroom TV.

I love my new headphones. They are beautiful and they really do silence background noise. My only little complaint is that I can’t turn the volume down enough. Even with the sound turned all the way down on my phone and the headphones, I still find myself trying to decrease the sound. I’ll adjust. They’re great!

Like the product.  Shipped fast as promised.  Fair price.Not sure yet if product will live up to my expectations of charging my phone useing wireless feature more than once before recharging charger.  Initial test charged once, then charger had to be recharged.  Will give it more tries...

Review.Titre: Decent pricing and wide variety make…
Review.Contenu: Decent pricing and wide variety make A4C a great resource. Weak spots in shipping times and tracking info are the only negatives I can come up with (4 day shipping delay, sub-contractor shipper and lack of tracking info until handed off to USPS).All in all, not an unpleasant experience.

Great sale price. Quick shipping. Nice packaging. It showed small band but once I opened the box included the large band. Only reason for the 4 star not 5 is because no instructions at all. Having never owned a fitbit product that was a learning curve. But I got it. Seems to work as it is expected.

I purchased for my daughter and husband a birthday gift and an anniversary gift. I purchased with just over a week before the date I needed. There was a hiccup with this shipping BUT customer service was awesome. I spoke with two different people on two different occasions and both times I got a human, whom spoke the same language as myself, was polite and extremely helpful. When I did receive products both were in great condition! I would definitely recommend them and they definitely have a future customer in myself.

A4C processed and shipped the order quickly and efficiently. The product itself (Bohm speaker) really left a lot to be desired. Great write up but second rate sound (it sounded a bit "Tinny"). Can't compare to the Bose portable speaker. On the other hand, for $29 what can you expect?

The product I purchased was high quality, and the price was excellent.  The only problem I had was the shipping, it took over a week to receive my order.  Very slow response, it went through DHL and then to the USPS.  Slow to be processed and delivered.

Review.Titre: Tracking was very strange on this one
Review.Contenu: Tracking was very strange on this one. Showed label printed, but not at Post office till the day it was delivered. They must be using a very old copy of Windows 10. Took almost a full day to update before I could use it. Now that it’s up and running, I am very happy with it.

Review.Titre: A4C offers quality products at very…
Review.Contenu: A4C offers quality products at very good prices.  The only negative I had was that my package Sat for 4 days at a depot less than 3 hours from my house with no explanation. While this is not directly under A4C's control, they chose the shipping carrier used.

Review.Titre: Website was easy to negotiate through
Review.Contenu: Website was easy to negotiate through, product description was true and accurate and ordering process was easy.  Reason for four star rating; I did not receive a confirmation of purchase notification or a confirmation when the item with tracking number was shipped.

Review.Titre: So this speaker looks amazing for a Christmas gift
Review.Contenu: So this speaker looks amazing , and the specs are amazing , I really hope it is , I purchased this for my son as he is a ups driver and wanted a Bluetooth speaker for his truck , so I got this ,,, I hope he loves it on Christmas,,,,

The product was delivered as promised. Product was exactly as described. I've purchased several items from them and have not been disappointed yet. Four stars because customer service is slow taking several days to respond. I would buy from them again.

Review.Titre: The only reason why I didn't give 5…
Review.Contenu: The only reason why I didn't give 5 stars is because the package came OPENED with a rubber band around it.  A bluetooth speaker in a plain   envelope, that wasn't even padded!  It's an electronic. How do you thoughtlessly send it this way?

I bought an Echo show (gen 1) that was advertised on sale in mid-November as a Christmas gift to get a jump on my Black Friday shopping. It turned out that the recipient of my gift received the newest generation 8 as well, and wanted to return my gift. I followed the appropriate channels and requested an RMA on 12/26. It was rejected due to being past the 30 day return policy.  However, Lacy reached out and was able to make an exception and authorize an RMA. I'm greatful that she took the time to go above and beyond to reconcile with an individual customer.  I commend their customer service for their resolution and thank you Lacy!

Review.Titre: Love the sound bar but it arrived with…
Review.Contenu: Love the sound bar but it arrived with big dent on the faceplate......could have been UPS because the packaging was damaged in the same place!....doesn’t seem to affect the performance so not worth the hassle to exchange!Thanks.       Iainmackinlay

An occasional item "far-Below-everywhere-else" sale price..like BstBuys 2017 copy of the MicroSoft "Surface 3" Win10 2-in-1 with pop-off magnetic keyboard, marked down at A4C to "Three for the price of 1"... I love it!

I've used A4C a number of times,es and been very happy.  This time was disappointing as the item really didn't perform at all. I was delighted in the "no hassle" phone call to return the item. I remain a loyal customer.

Review.Titre: A4C was good for the purchase process
Review.Contenu: A4C was good for the purchase of the product process including the quick shipping but the product itself was terrible, it didn't work. It was the RCA Amplified HD Digital Indoor Antenna. I didn't get one channel over the air! This is my third purchase of an HD digital indoor antenna from different retailers and they ALL didn't work! And they claimed to have ranges from 80 to 100 miles. It is NOT worth the hassle to return a $10 item, learned from my experience, the HD indoor digital antenna's just don't work, the technology is just not there yet, don't waste your money if you live in the suburbs or an urban area.

Review.Titre: Received my order less than a week…
Review.Contenu: Received my order less than a week after I placed the order. Christmas gifts for my grandchildren so I cannot attest to the quality of the product. However, I feel the reputation of otter box speaks for itself.

Review.Titre: Return soundbox to get one that works
Review.Contenu: I bought a soundbox for my TV, which did not work.  Called A4C and they did not have a tech support person that could help me troubleshoot it, so they are sending me another one to try.  Hope this one works.  They were nice about it.

Review.Titre: This company is great with processing…
Review.Contenu: This company is great with processing the request for a return in a very cordial and professional way.  The ear phones did not have as large a surface area covering the ears as I needed; therefore, the headpiece was tight.

Review.Titre: Good quality and good customer service

Review.Contenu: I like the size of this particular speaker, it’s just right! The carabiner style hook, is very practical. The battery charge doesn’t last as long. It’s waterproof, rugged and the sound is not too bad.

Ordered 2 phone chargers. 1 worked and 1 did not work. I contacted a4c asking for a 2nd working phone charger instead of a refund. A4C did not send a 2nd working charger, but they refunded the non-functioning charger.
Great company to work with only negatives are time for deliveries, usually 10-14 days and if you qualify for a refund, nonworking item, you only get 90% of the price credited to your credit card.

Item received as described and works perfectly. Great pricing. Delivery took a bit long and the package tracking process requires a few steps, as tracking info isn't easily displayed on the account page.

Review.Titre: it was delivered within a reasonable…
Review.Contenu: it was delivered within a reasonable time and in good condition.  the only thing is I couldn't  find an estimated delivery date.    I like to have an estimated date in case I am gone for a few days.

I like it , it’s also a little slow because it’s a older iPad and some of the new game apps don’t work . But all in all it’s looks like new , and checking my email and looking at new online its works well

Review.Titre: Great price, quick shipping; was the box opened?
Review.Contenu: Received the item in reasonable time. Looked like the box had been opened. I have not used the item yet, as it will be an Xmas gift. No indication that there will be any problem.  The price was great.
Pro:The product was shipped fast.Good product.Good quality.Hold charge as said.Recommended.Con:No package just in plastic bag and was not informed in advertisement.Heavy for only 3000

Review.Titre: This is my second purchase from A4C and…
Review.Contenu: This is my second purchase from A4C and I am happy overall with all the products I received. They arrived quicker than expected and were packaged well. My first purchase of an ipad4 was perfect. I purchased a second ipad4 and an ipad air on my second visit. The only complaint I have is that the ipad air shows definite signs of wear and there were dents on the back that are a little worrisome. The force that it took to create the dents can't be good for the internal hardware. The wear on the edges could have been caused by a case and doesn't affect the ipad's performance. Only time will tell if the dents will have an impact on the life of the device. I am very pleased with my purchases especially when you factor in the savings over a brand new decice.

Review.Titre: I have not used the grow lights I…
Review.Contenu: I have not used the grow lights I received, as I am waiting to move this year.  However, I was very impressed with the packaging.  I had no problem placing my order, either.  Quick and easy.
Received my Google Home Max as described and met my expectations as stated when I ordered. I would have given a 5th star if it would have exceeded my expectations.
The Lifeproof Bluetooth speaker has performed very well as I have used it several times. I was leery of purchasing a returned product but it works well and I am very pleased.

Review.Titre: My dealings with the company have been…good
Review.Contenu: My dealings with the company have been great. However I did have to send back an item twice as it was defective. But it was a no hassle return which speaks highly of the company.
Package arrived within a week. I had some charging issues with the device at first. Looked up a YouTube video on how to solve it. Problem solved. Product runs as it should. Thanks.
I used the silicone gloves for the first time this week.  I removed a baking pan from the oven whose temperature was 375 degrees.  I didn’t burn my hands.   Goodbye potholders!!

Review.Titre: Good Experience and a Good Product
Review.Contenu: I enjoyed my order with A4C and it was processed quickly and delivered promptly. Their sale prices were also very good and I was able to get a good item and a very good value.
Overall, it was a great experience buying from a4c.com. I think my banking information was compromised after the transaction but was caught in time. Very happy other than that!
Works just fine.  Easy enough that an 80 year old(me) semi techie could set it up.  Only thing missing was the batteries.  Fortunately  I. Had some😀👵🏻
Product as described. Item shipped quickly.

Review.Titre: The soundbar is an excellent value with…
Review.Contenu: The soundbar is an excellent value with great sound, however, the usability is counter-intuitive. Love the acoustics, but still have no idea how I made it work with my TV.

Review.Titre: I just received my bluetooth speaker…
Review.Contenu: I just received my bluetooth speaker and it works great. I only gave it 4 stars because I've only had it a few days...I'm waiting to see how durable it is.

Review.Titre: I would love this company to refurbish…
Review.Contenu: I would love this company to refurbish my wife’s old flex fit bit but they told me that they cannot do that so I asked them for further assistance and no answer
On time delivery, product meets expectations.  One star off - for packaging:  it was very difficult to get the product out of its plastic wrapping/packaging.

Review.Titre: Package arrived late but in good condition
Review.Contenu: Package arrived after Christmas but the phone cases I ordered were very nice and without issues! Thanks for looking after my order for me A4C!
Please please please, use a different shipping service than USPS. My package sat at post office for over a week in "Pre-shipment".

Review.Titre: Great CS follow up and overall good CS
Review.Contenu: Great CS follow up and overall good CS. R stars because the product I received a refurbished one didn't work at all not even turn on so QC is poor.

Review.Titre: Works good and provides great sound
Review.Contenu: Works good and provides great sound. The only con is that people I'm talking to on my iphone or on Facebook chat say it causes their sound to echo.
Web site transaction very smooth.  Shipped fairly quickly.  My only criticism was that it seemed to take too long to get order updates from the company.
Great transaction! Order was easy, arrived in a timely manner- I think it was about a week or less. No issues at all! Recommend!
I've ordered the disposable mask twice.  Quality of the disposable mask is good and shipping didn't take long.  I would order again.
The only complaint I have is the shipping took a bit longer than I would have liked, but given the current environment, it was acceptable.
The bluetooth earbuds were just as described and arrived in a short period of time.  The sound is pretty good and I would recommend them to others.
everything was to my satisfaction except the delivery. package was sent to 3 states before it made it to my state, took 10 days for delivery.
Shipping/tracking information is scant. The product took 6 business days to arrive. The product was in good condition.  Overall, good value.
It is nice and as advertised however I mount my phone in a holder in my car and it interferes with the holder even in the retracted position
Good prices.  Fast delivery.  Cheapest price for an echo dot.I mainly look for good prices on watches and Tablets.  They sell out fast.
No problems with the order.  I received the package in a decent amount of time with no damage.  The speaker I ordered worked pretty good.

Review.Titre: Although the product sent was incorrect…

The shipping info was updated too late I thought I was scammed by you but fortunately everything went fine little late but fine so far

Was easy to order and didn't need to call customer service, but the package tracking leaves a lot to be desired.
The price was great. The product looks good. The shipping was a little delayed, but I am not complaining with free shipping.
Product arrived on the previously stated date. The product was new and as advertised.I’am satisfied. I would use again.

Review.Titre: Easy to place order and product arrive…

Quick service. Product arrived as expected. Price was very good. My experiences with A4C have always been good.

Excellent service - had to contact customer service because of a misapplied coupon code. Went into this process unsure what to expect, but can say with confidence that I wouldn’t hesitate to purchase from A4C again.
Great vendor, everything went smoothly, I got a great deal and my purchase was delivered two days earlier than initially estimated.

Review.Titre: I bought a Anker power conf and Liberty…

Products shipped quicky, arrived on time, and in excellent condition.
Great product and good condition. Will shop again. Thanks.
Awesome! Price on an awesome product. Good communication. Received the items swiftly.
Fast shipping, package arrive early. No problems in the purchase
Order process was easy,  fast delivery and the product was better than I expected at a tremendous discounted price so overall very very happy with the whole experience

Review.Titre: A4C has been my go to place for tech purchases…

Review.Titre: Ordered headphones and got them and a…

Made a couple changes to the order and they were responsive.

Review.Titre: Very good communication and help with…
Review.Contenu: Very good communication and help with the online chat person Kim and follow up with emails to solve the issue. And fast turnaround time from sending my broken earbuds in and getting new ones. Very good customer service in the current business world these days.
The item i ordered was slightly defective but still usable. A4C customer support were extremely fast in responding to me and resolving my issue in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Product came in a short amount of time…

Review.Titre: Best price for products purchased + amazing customer service!

Review.Titre: First time buying from A4C and been a…

Great product, excellent price. Otterbox defender series for 11 Pro Max, was in immaculate condition and I am very satisfied with my purchase. A4C brings great savings to the masses. I’ve shopped here for more than 5 years and am always pleased with quality and price on offer.
